dsDescriptionValue.value:
These data sets were created as part of The Center for International Development’s ongoing research into the role of geography in economic development (see www.cid.harvard.edu/economic.htm). They have been created between 1998 and 1999.

CID's geography data sets have been organized into three general groups:

1. General Measures of Geography,
2. Infectious Diseases, and
3. Agricultural Measures.

There is a separate README file for each group.

Please reference CID if you use this data in a publication.

files.description: comma separated value file (agric.csv) of the agriculture data that can be opened as a spreadsheet in Excel, or used in conjunction with the Stata do file (agric.do).
files.label: agric.csv
categories: 4. Agricultural Measures

dataFile.description: comma separated value file (agric.csv) of the agriculture data that can be opened as a spreadsheet in Excel, or used in conjunction with the Stata do file (agric.do).

files.description: written in Stata to load the data in agric.csv and create the variable labels etc. in agric.dta. It can be used as a model to load the data into other statistical packages besides Stata.
files.label: agric.do
categories: 4. Agricultural Measures

dataFile.description: written in Stata to load the data in agric.csv and create the variable labels etc. in agric.dta. It can be used as a model to load the data into other statistical packages besides Stata.

files.description: Microsoft Word document (agric-dta.doc) containing a list of each variable within the agriculture data set, a description of each variable, how the variable was created, the source of the variable and any extra notes.
files.label: agric-dta.doc
categories: 4. Agricultural Measures

dataFile.description: Microsoft Word document (agric-dta.doc) containing a list of each variable within the agriculture data set, a description of each variable, how the variable was created, the source of the variable and any extra notes.

files.description: data set with the infectious disease data by country (agric.dta).
files.label: agric.tab
categories: 4. Agricultural Measures

dataFile.description: data set with the infectious disease data by country (agric.dta).
